      • toMat

      • houghCircles

        public static java.util.List<Location> houghCircles(Camera camera,
                                                    Length minDiameter,
                                                    Length maxDiameter,
                                                    Length minDistance)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds circles of the given min and maxDiameter, no less than minDistance apart by capturing an image from the given Camera. Results are returned as a List of Location where X and Y represent the center of the circle, Z is that of the Camera and rotation is the diameter of the circle found. Results are returned sorted by distance from the Camera Location in ascending order.
        Parameters:
        camera -
        minDiameter -
        maxDiameter -
        minDistance -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • toGray

        public static Mat toGray(Mat mat)
        Convert the given Mat to grayscale. Conversion is done in place and if the Mat is already grayscale nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        mat -
        Returns:
